descripcio: This Afternoon: A chance of showers, mainly before 3pm.  Cloudy, with a high near 42. West wind 7 to 10 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 50%. New precipitation amounts of less than a tenth of an inch possible.

Tonight: A slight chance of rain and snow showers before 8pm, then a chance of snow showers between 8pm and midnight.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 24. West wind 11 to 16 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 30%. New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
Saturday: A slight chance of snow showers after 9am.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 34. Breezy, with a west wind 16 to 21 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
Saturday Night: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. West wind 6 to 11 mph.
Veterans Day: Partly sunny, with a high near 39. Calm wind becoming southwest 5 to 7 mph in the morning.
Sunday Night: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28.
Monday: Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45.
Monday Night: Rain and snow showers likely, becoming all snow after 1am.  Cloudy, with a low around 32. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
Tuesday: Snow showers likely.  Cloudy, with a high near 36. Chance of precipitation is 60%.
